question: Question: In this reaction, an aldose reacts with an amine on an amino acid to form a glycosylamine, which loses water to form a ketosamine.  [10] Name this reaction between amino acids and reducing sugars that is important in food chemistry. It is responsible for the browning of meats and bread when cooked.
